definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Work on a new sports center and hospital is also under way.
sentences.chinese: 一座新的體育中心和醫院也正在籌建之中。

sentences.english: The studio is still under construction and won't open until mid-March.
sentences.chinese: 這個工作室仍在籌建中，明年三月中旬才能營業。

sentences.english: During the period, I participated in the preparatory work of Beijing Wangjing Branch and finished it completely.
sentences.chinese: 其間，參與完成了北京望京支行的籌建工作。

sentences.english: Toumingzhisuan sodium series products and cosmetics project planning.
sentences.chinese: 透明質酸鈉系列產品及化妝品項目的籌建。

sentences.english: I would like to establish a production-oriented enterprises statues, is now in preparation.
sentences.chinese: 我欲建立一個以生產神像爲主的企業，現在正籌建中。

sentences.english: He said the Commerce Department is setting up a national programme to work on the project.
sentences.chinese: 他說商務部正在籌建一個國家級項目來進行這項工作。

sentences.english: "Long Wang Pond" is a farmer park opened up by farmers with their own money.
sentences.chinese: “龍王塘”是農民自己動手籌建的一個農民公園。

sentences.english: The school, founded by Shaffner and a group of parents, opened three years ago.
sentences.chinese: 三年前，沙夫納和一些家長們聯合籌建了這所學校。

sentences.english: It is said that our school is preparing to construct an ungulate research institution.
sentences.chinese: 聽說我們學校正在籌建有蹄類動物研究所。

sentences.english: He set up a tennis club.
sentences.chinese: 他籌建了一個網球俱樂部。

sentences.english: I confess to being considering starting a new project.
sentences.chinese: 我承認我正在考慮籌建一個新項目。

sentences.english: Avoid zigzags in preparation,and reduce the waste of investment.
sentences.chinese: 避免籌建期間走彎路，減少投資的浪費。

sentences.english: Ms. McNeill started to build her classroom library.
sentences.chinese: 麥克尼爾開始籌建自己的班級圖書室。

sentences.english: Revolutionary Committee of Shanghai built Shanghai Foreign Language audio-visual Education Center.
sentences.chinese: 上海市革命委員會籌建上海外語電化教學館。

sentences.english: The Ministry of Laour is establishing a pre-employment training system to alleviate the presure of employment.
sentences.chinese: 勞動部計劃籌建就業預備制度以減緩就業壓力。

sentences.english: When the Gezhi Academy in Shanghai was being prepared to construct, there was a plan for the Great Iron-House Museum.
sentences.chinese: 上海格致書院在籌建時曾有建大鐵房博物館的計劃。

definition: to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
